channel.title: Python on Networks, Scripts, Musings

item.title: iAmAlive Script ( APIC-EM & Tropo API )
item.description: iAmAlive Script iAmAlive script confirms if a host is reachable and triggers a collaborative action via Tropo; Tropo will send an sms to the network admin if the host is reachable or call the network admin if the host is unreachable. The idea is to demonstrate the capabilities of APIC-EM 1 as well as Tropo APIs and how they can be leveraged on to facilitate collaboration within distributed teams. Flow Prerequisites Python Tropo Account with Outbound SMS and Call capabilities Access to an APIC-EM Platform 2 Code configuration file (iAmAlive_config.
